item.title: 关于我
item.description: Nobe Kanai 现大一学生，喜欢编程， 音乐（车万）， 还有黑哲。 学习渣渣， 现嘤语专业。 专业划水(骄傲) 技能评价： Python 0.5 HTML5 0.5 CSS3 0.3 Sass 0.1 Javascript 0.2 nginx 0.1 SQL 0.1 Redis 0.1 Vue.js 0.3 Typescript 0.1 Flask

item.title: Impacts of Information Technology on Society in the new Century
item.description: INTRODUCTION In the past few decades there has been a revolution in computing and communications, and all indications are that technological progress and use of information technology will continue at a rapid pace. Accompanying and supporting the dramatic increases in the power and use of new information technologies has been the declining cost of communications as a result of both technological improvements and increased competition. According to Moore’s law the processing power of microchips is doubling every 18 months.
